definition: according to/to act in accordance with/to depend on/to seize/to occupy
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: He was anointed princeps ; the Roman empire is said to begin with his accession.
sentences.chinese: 他被奉爲元首，羅馬帝國據說就是從他即位開始。

sentences.english: It is said that the old tree has stood here two thousand years.
sentences.chinese: 據說這棵樹已經在這裏活了兩千年了。

sentences.english: it is said the black hole can engulf everything nearby such as stars.
sentences.chinese: 據說黑洞可以將周圍的一切物體，如星星吞食掉。

sentences.english: According to the story, Lao-tzu, the older of the two sages, thought very little of Confucius.
sentences.chinese: 據說，兩位聖人中那位年長的老於很瞧不起孔子。

sentences.english: It is said to ward off evil spirits.
Peacock also is said to be able to foretell rain, and dances when rain is coming.
sentences.chinese: 據說孔雀能夠預知雨水，將要下雨的時候就會跳舞。

sentences.english: Like Bush, Hoover is said to have become depressed.
sentences.chinese: 像布什一樣，據說胡佛變得鬱鬱寡歡。

sentences.english: It is said that reshoring is a growing trend.
sentences.chinese: 據說企業“迴流”將呈增長趨勢。

sentences.english: In this case the wave is said to have been diffracted .
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，據說，波發生了衍射。

sentences.english: People say that a cold wet nose is an indicator of health in dogs or cats.
sentences.chinese: 據說涼涼的溼鼻子表示貓狗健康無病。

sentences.english: Six are said to have been killed, and 11 wounded.
sentences.chinese: 據說，已有六個人喪生，11人受傷。

sentences.english: It is said that it is the symbol of British Royalty and built in 1087.
sentences.chinese: 據說倫敦塔是英國皇室的象徵，建於1087年。

sentences.english: The tradition of serving starters or hors d'oeuvres is said to have arisen in Russia.
sentences.chinese: 上開胃菜或餐前小點心的傳統據說起源於俄羅斯。

sentences.english: Ann: It’s said about 8 million yuan. I have never heard that any car made in China has such a high market price.
sentences.chinese: 據說是八百萬，我從沒聽過國產車有這樣高的市價。

sentences.english: Snakes are said to fascinate small animals and birds.
sentences.chinese: 據說蛇能蠱惑小動物和小鳥。

sentences.english: As noted, most of the internationalization code is not reliably implemented yet.
sentences.chinese: 據說，大部分國際化代碼還沒有被可靠地實現。

definition: to hear (sth said)/one hears (that)/hearsay/listening and speaking
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)

that one/that thing/that (as opposed to this)/(used before a verb or adjective for emphasis)/(used to humorously or indirectly refer to sth embarrassing, funny etc, or when one can't think of the right word)/(used in speech as a filler, similar to "umm", "you know" etc)/(euph.) menstruation/sex/also pr. [nei4 ge5]
to estimate/to reckon/CL:個|个[ge4]/(coll.) to suppose
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
